INVALID_FROM_DATE: Invalid from date. Date should be in ISO_8601 format [YYYY]-[MM]-[DD]T[hh]:[mm]:[ss]-[SSSS]
INVALID_TO_DATE: Invalid to date. Date should be in ISO_8601 format [YYYY]-[MM]-[DD]T[hh]:[mm]:[ss]-[SSSS]
TO_EARLIER_THAN_FROM: From date should be earlier than To date.
REPORT_METRICS_ERROR: Unable to report metrics for the given input.
QUALITY_REPORT_ERROR: Error getting quality report from provider.
